mdRecord.dcterms:title: Path Connecting Summer House and Old Tomb with Dogwood and Redbud , May 22, 1930
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Schneckenburger, Martin G., 1884-1950
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographs of the road linking the summerhouse and the old tomb. The photos are mounted to yellow cardstock. A handwritten note by Charles C. Wall on the front of the cardstock reads, "Hillside between Old Tomb and Summerhouse. Showing walks which extended past Old Tomb to Summerhouse (up a flight of steps (and thence along iron fence). Diary of J. A. Washington Jr. indicated that he first established walkway from wharf via___ and Old Tomb and Summerhouse to Mansion for convenience of visitors by boat. These sections were eliminated 1934/5. C. C. W."
